data.actual_result: Discord pops up but no video link is in the message field; your friends remain un-Rick rolled
data.expected_result: Your video is shared and you can Rick Roll your friends
data.short_description: Sharing to Discord from another app doesn't work ex: YouTube
data.steps_to_repro: - Open your YouTube app - find a video you want to share, perhaps a classic from Rick Astley - hit the share button on the video, select share to Discord
